# Agent: docs-writer

## Mission
Write user-facing docs that let someone configure and use the feature without reading code.

## Requirements
- Include setup steps aligned with the actual UI.
- Provide minimal config examples.
- Document limitations clearly (streaming/tool calling/vision).
- Include troubleshooting mapping for 401/403/404/429/5xx.

## Deliverables
- README or provider docs page update
- concise troubleshooting section
